title: 3D Modelling and Texturing With Blender
headline: Learn basic techniques for modeling and applying textures to 3D objects using Blender in this free online course.
description: Are you constantly amazed by the stunning 3D graphics you see on billboards all around you and want to learn how to create something similar? This short course on computer graphics will teach you how to use the Blender software. The functionality of various menu items, panels and tools in Blender and key techniques such as ‘extruding’ will be explained. In addition, you will learn how to model various real-world objects on your own.
courseDescription:
Do you ever wonder how they create 3D graphics in games and movies? Have you ever wanted to learn more about it but didn't know where to start? This foundation-level course will provide you with all the information and skills you'll need to model real-world three dimensional objects on your own. Subject matter experts from Stone River eLearning are the publishers of this course. The company specializes in high-quality, video-based IT training content.

We introduce you to the design software called ‘Blender’. Next, we will explain the basic features and tabs in Blender using examples. Then we introduce the concept of object manipulation with real-life practical demonstrations. Various tools used for modeling objects in Blender, like the ‘knife’ tool and ‘extruding’, will be addressed next. We outline the concepts of propositional editing and mirroring in Blender.

Texturing is the process of applying a 2D image to a 3D object. The following section will teach you how to add an image to all surfaces of an object. We will explore various examples to illustrate the application of texture and material. Finally, you will learn the process of rendering and adding light to the objects designed in Blender. This course is suitable for individuals interested in 3D design or who want to learn something new. Seize this opportunity to learn a new skill and enroll in this course today!
